main_definition: A place where students go to learn, often from a young age to adulthood, under the guidance of teachers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Institution for educating children and teenagers
meanings_and_examples.example: I dropped my son off at school every morning before work.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A specific set of lessons, usually lasting a year
meanings_and_examples.example: She is taking French II this semester in college.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To train or educate someone in a particular skill
meanings_and_examples.example: He went to school on how to play the guitar with an experienced musician.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group of people who have similar interests, values or activities
meanings_and_examples.example: I joined a cooking school last summer to learn new culinary techniques.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The process of learning and acquiring knowledge
meanings_and_examples.example: Her favorite part about going to university is the opportunity for school in various subjects.
